definition: of or relating to the spine or spinal cord, anesthesia of the lower half of the body
details:
adjective
- of or relating to the spine or spinal cord
= example: of or relating to the spine or spinal cord
noun
- anesthesia of the lower half of the body
= example: anesthesia of the lower half of the body
= synonyms: spinal anesthesia, spinal anaesthesia
